FuncDef:
The hwtacacs-server timer response-timeout command configures the HWTACACS server response-timeout value.
The undo hwtacacs-server timer response-timeout command resets the HWTACACS server response-timeout value.
By default, the server response-timeout value is 5 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the value of response-timeout.
It is an integer data type. The value range is from 1 to 300 seconds. The default value is 5 seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Either the response timeout of the server or the TCP connection timeout result in the disconnection between the Router and the HWTACACS server because the HWTACACS server is based on TCP.
